Plus, other fun luxury options to gift this season.

Photos: Courtesy of brands; Artwork: Brooke Frischer

Plus, other fun luxury options to gift this season.

We know it's hard to find the right gifts for your loved ones, so we've compiled a ton of fashion and beauty-focused gift guides tailored to a range of interests and budgets. Check out our latest below and find more right here.

As we inch closer to the start of the winter holidays, it's the perfect time to consider an advent calendar as a gift to accompany the best — and perhaps longest — countdown of the year. Whether you're gifting yourself or a loved one, there's no better way to ring in the joy of the festivity-filled season with a new beauty product or accessory every single day. From luxury boxes curated by the likes of Dior, Charlotte Tilbury, Swarovski and more to everyday brands like Papier and Nespresso, there's a sweet surprise in store for any kind of recipient.

Below, find our top picks for the holiday-themed advent calendars with the best value and offerings.

Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Diamond Chest of Beauty 12-Door Advent Calendar, $199, available here

Quince 12 Days of 18K Gold Vermeil Jewelry Advent Calendar, $695 $400, available here

MAC 24K Holiday Advent Calendar, $225, available here
